dt: {bc}the drupaceous fruit of the {d_link|coconut palm|coconut palm} whose outer fibrous husk yields {d_link|coir|coir} and whose nut contains thick edible meat and, in the fresh fruit, a clear liquid {dx_def}see {dxt|coconut water||}{/dx_def}

shortdef: the drupaceous fruit of the coconut palm whose outer fibrous husk yields coir and whose nut contains thick edible meat and, in the fresh fruit, a clear liquid
the edible meat of the coconut
the coconut palm; also : its fruit

dt: {bc}a large burrowing land crab ({it}Birgus latro{/it}) that is widely distributed about islands of the tropical Indian and Pacific Oceans, has a varied omnivorous diet that includes coconuts, and possesses an oily flesh which is esteemed as a local delicacy

shortdef: a large burrowing land crab (Birgus latro) that is widely distributed about islands of the tropical Indian and Pacific Oceans, has a varied omnivorous diet that includes coconuts, and possesses an oily flesh which is esteemed as a local delicacy

dt: {bc}a thick, white, milky liquid extracted from grated coconut after it has been soaked in boiling water

shortdef: a thick, white, milky liquid extracted from grated coconut after it has been soaked in boiling water

dt: {bc}a fatty oil or semisolid fat extracted from fresh coconuts and used especially in making soaps and food products

shortdef: a fatty oil or semisolid fat extracted from fresh coconuts and used especially in making soaps and food products

dt: {bc}a tall pinnate-leaved coconut-bearing palm ({it}Cocos nucifera{/it}) that grows along tropical coasts

shortdef: a tall pinnate-leaved coconut-bearing palm (Cocos nucifera) that grows along tropical coasts

dt: {bc}the clear liquid within a young, fresh coconut

shortdef: the clear liquid within a young, fresh coconut

dt: city in southeastern Florida north-northwest of Fort Lauderdale {it}population{/it} 52,909

dt: {bc}an outdoor game in which players throw balls at coconuts set up on poles in order to knock them down
